TopicTitle: ODIN Orbital Kinetic Bombardment Weapon (point at the ground and shoot)

Articles.Content:
After the failed ONDS Zokesian engineers decided to create a new orbital attack satellite. It had to be stylish,cool looking, practical, have at least 6 shots and have a docking node for servicing.

Here she is:

Shooting a payload:

Video by DarkenedMinecraft:

How to:

Shoot: Engage full throttle and stage.

Aim: pretty much point at a point on Kerbin and shoot.

You can shoot payloads how you want, you can either detach them and deorbit,

or point the hole ODIN and fire and disconnect at the same time aka "shoot".

This is what you will get:

You can get much steeper trajectories(up to 90 degrees).

LAUNCH(important):

Launch like anything else, only before launch click that probe body and select "Control from here"

Action groups:

1: Toggle panels

2: Toggle antennas

0: Decouples everything

Abort: ????????

Download

The ODIN has its own engines and RCS, the staging is set up so payloads fire one at a time.

Don't forget to THROTTLE UP!

Property of Zokesia Skunkworks

You can point prograde and pitch down to -80 deg. When shooting like that the reentry angle wont be that steep but the projectile will have quite a high velocity.
